snippet.title: Silence of the Siren Announcement Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
A turn-based sci-fi strategy game by Oxymoron Games combines exploration and exciting clashes on the battlefield. Take control over several different species, raise powerful armies and destroy your opponent! Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2147380/Silence_of_the_Siren

Website: https://silenceofthesiren.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/qaQQat2dbC
Twitter: https://twitter.com/theSOTSgame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/people/Silence-of-the-Siren/100086283092459/

#turnbased
#announcement
